task.voice: 我们自研的多触感柔型灵巧手采用仿人包握的构型设计，能自适应抓握不同的工具，提供更强抓握力； 在手指设计上，我们的灵巧手也独具巧思，采用高抓重比的主动关节，可提供10倍的抓重，同时能实现拇指120°及四指140°大角度旋转； 为确保作业安全，我们也在手指内增加了自适应的柔型防撞回弹，保证异常碰撞时不造成意外的损伤； 最后，我们的手搭载了自研的柔型超薄触觉传感器，它能在单指面内提供14点高密度敏感单元，有效实现为机器人提供多维的传感信息。
task.voice_en: We've developed a multi-tactile soft and dexterous hand with a human-like gripping design that can adapt to hold different tools and provide a stronger grip. In terms of finger design, our dexterous hand is also uniquely thoughtful, using active joints with a high grip-to-weight ratio, offering 10 times the grip force, while also enabling the thumb to rotate 120° and the four fingers to rotate 140°. To ensure operational safety, we've also added adaptive soft anti-collision rebound in the fingers to prevent unexpected damage in case of abnormal collisions. Finally, our hand is equipped with our own soft and ultra-thin tactile sensors, which can provide 14 high-density sensitive units on a single finger surface, effectively providing multidimensional sensory information to the robot.
